name: rks-system
effect: Changes this Pokémon's type to match its held Memory. This ability cannot be copied, replaced, or nullified. This ability only takes effect for Silvally.
short_effect: Changes this Pokémon's type to match its held Memory.

flavor_text.sun_moon: Changes the Pokémon’s type to match the memory disc it holds.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Changes the Pokémon’s type to match the memory disc it holds.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Changes the Pokémon’s type to match the memory disc it holds.
